title: Choices
description: Rules and demands are all that Selena knows how to live by in the world of assassins and thieves. Emotions have no place in her world, yet lately, Rick, her partner in blood is igniting a passion so fierce sheâ€™s struggling to concentrate on her job. Her limits are tested however when her parents ship her off to an elusive academy with an even more elusive secret. Suddenly her feelings for Rick are not so important when she has to fight to save her life.Selena finds out there are worse things than running from love and they come equipped with fangs.
author: Alexei Knightsbridge
